item.title: TSA Catches Man Smuggling Live Turtle In His Pants At NJ Airport
item.description: An officer conducting a pat-down on the man man figured out he was hiding somethin in the groin area of his pants.

item.title: Man Accused Of Swallowing $770K Worth Of Diamonds From Florida Tiffany's
item.description: Jaythan Gilder allegedly asked jailers, “Am I going to be charged with what’s in my stomach?”.

item.title: Sydney's Stinky Corpse Flower Attracts Thousands Wanting A Whiff
item.description: An endangered tropical plant that emits the stench of a rotting corpse during its rare blooms has begun to flower in a greenhouse in Sydney.
